sentences.sContent: You do not need to dress up for dinner.
sentences.sCn: 你不必为了晚宴盛装打扮。

sentences.sContent: I just love the fun of dressing up in another era's clothing.
sentences.sCn: 我就是喜欢穿另一个时代的服装，很好玩。

trans.tranOther: If you dress up or dress yourself up, you put on different clothes, in order to make yourself look more formal than usual or to disguise yourself
